sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE161055 SET PUOFER_ANTY = #puoferAnty# , MLTYM_ANTY = #mltymAnty# , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY = #prtafirSchlFalymmAnty# , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY = #spildtnPstoficAnty# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey# AND PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD=#piclEmplDivCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , AA.NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , AA.NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , AA.NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , AA.NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT , AA.NP_HTHR_AREA_DDC_AMT , AA.HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , AA.HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , AA.MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , AA.MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , AA.PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , AA.PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM
, BB.NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM AS NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM_01 , BB.NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM AS NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM_01 , BB.NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM AS NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM_01 , BB.PUOFER_ANTY AS PUOFER_ANTY_01 , BB.PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM AS PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM_01 , BB.MLTYM_ANTY AS MLTYM_ANTY_01 , BB.MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM AS MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM_01 , BB.PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY AS PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY_01 , BB.PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM AS PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM_01 , BB.SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY AS SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY_01 , BB.SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM AS SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM_01
, CC.NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM AS NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM_02 , CC.NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM AS NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM_02 , CC.NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM AS NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM_02 , CC.PUOFER_ANTY AS PUOFER_ANTY_02 , CC.PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM AS PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM_02 , CC.MLTYM_ANTY AS MLTYM_ANTY_02 , CC.MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM AS MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM_02 , CC.PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY AS PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY_02 , CC.PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM AS PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM_02 , CC.SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY AS SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY_02 , CC.SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM AS SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM_02
FROM YE161050 AA , ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD , NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM , PUOFER_ANTY , PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , MLTYM_ANTY , MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY , PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR
FROM YE161055 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD= 'Y0130001' ) BB /* 주근무지 */ , ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD , NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM , PUOFER_ANTY , PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , MLTYM_ANTY , MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY , PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR
FROM YE161055 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD= 'Y0130002' ) CC /* 종근무지 */ WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
AND AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY
AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = CC.YRTX_BLGG_YR(+) AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = CC.CLUT_SEPT_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY(+)
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE161055 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161055 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD , NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM , PUOFER_ANTY , PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , MLTYM_ANTY , MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY , PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #piclEmplDivCd# , #natPennPrmmSum# , #natPennAraPrmmSum# , #natPennDducSum# , #puoferAnty# , #puoferAntyDducSum# , #mltymAnty# , #mltymAntyDducSum# , #prtafirSchlFalymmAnty# , #prtafirSchlDducSum# , #spildtnPstoficAnty# , #spildtnPstoficDducSum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE161055 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD=#piclEmplDivCd# , NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM=#natPennPrmmSum# , NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM=#natPennAraPrmmSum# , NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM=#natPennDducSum# , PUOFER_ANTY=#puoferAnty# , PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM=#puoferAntyDducSum# , MLTYM_ANTY=#mltymAnty# , MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM=#mltymAntyDducSum# , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY=#prtafirSchlFalymmAnty# , PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM=#prtafirSchlDducSum# , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY=#spildtnPstoficAnty# , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM=#spildtnPstoficDducSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD=#piclEmplDivCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE161055 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD=#piclEmplDivCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD , NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM , PUOFER_ANTY , PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , MLTYM_ANTY , MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY , PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161055 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD=#piclEmplDivCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD , NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM , PUOFER_ANTY , PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , MLTYM_ANTY , MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY , PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161055 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE161055 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
